argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nmf.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | nmf.n | |- N = ( norm ` G ) |
| 3 |  | nmeq0.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( dist ` G ) = ( dist ` G ) |
| 5 | 2, 1, 3, 4 | #P_nmval | |- ( A e. X -> ( N ` A ) = ( A ( dist ` G ) .0. ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( A ( dist ` G ) .0. ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) = 0 <-> ( A ( dist ` G ) .0. ) = 0 ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ngpgrp | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 10 | 1, 3 | #P_grpidcl | |- ( G e. Grp -> .0. e. X ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> .0. e. X ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ngpxms | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. *MetSp ) |
| 13 | 1, 4 | #P_xmseq0 | |- ( ( G e. *MetSp /\ A e. X /\ .0. e. X ) -> ( ( A ( dist ` G ) .0. ) = 0 <-> A = .0. ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ .0. e. X ) -> ( ( A ( dist ` G ) .0. ) = 0 <-> A = .0. ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( A ( dist ` G ) .0. ) = 0 <-> A = .0. ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 15 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( N ` A ) = 0 <-> A = .0. ) ) |
